text: An Arcadian Maid is a 1910 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithAn Arcadian MaidPaolo Cherchi Usai. The Griffith Project, Volume 3: Films Produced in July - December 1909 and stars Mary Pickford, Mack Sennett, and George Nichols. ==Actors== *Mary Pickford as Priscilla *Mack Sennett as The Peddlar *George Nichols as The Man of the House *Kate Bruce as The Lady of the House ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1910 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: An Arcadian Maid
